authors.author: Daniel Brink Towner Julia H. Johnston

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Grace, grace,
God's grace,
Grace that will pardon
and cleanse within!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Grace, grace,
God's grace,
Grace that is greater
than all our sin!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Marvelous grace
of our loving Lord,
Grace that exceeds
our sin and our guilt,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Yonder on Calvary's
mount outpoured,
There where the blood
of the Lamb was spilt!

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Sin and despair,
like the sea waves cold,
Threaten the soul
with infinite loss.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Grace that is greater,
yes, grace untold,
Points to the refuge,
the mighty Cross.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Dark is the stain
that we cannot hide.
What can avail
to wash it away?

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Look! There is flowing
a crimson tide;
Whiter than snow
you may be today.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Marvelous, infinite, matchless grace,
Freely bestowed
on all who believe!

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
You that are longing
to see His face,
Will you this moment
His grace receive?
